body.name: PUKAMI Criss Cross Chair,Armless Cross Legged Office Desk Chair No Wheels,Fabric Padded Modern Swivel Height Adjustable Mid Back Wide Seat Computer Task Vanity Chair for Home Office(Beige)
features: ✨【Stylish Desk Chair No Wheels】An elegant blend of comfort and style, the elimination of armrests and castors removes all unnecessary decoration, effortlessly matching any décor to create an impression of comfort and elegance, the unique black lacquered cross aluminium base with non-slip natural rubber feet attached to each support leg to prevent scratching and slipping, perfect for offices, bedrooms, studies, living rooms, dressing tables, parlours and dorm rooms.

✨【Wide & Soft Seat】This armless office chair has a widened seat so you can comfortably sit cross-legged or curl up in the chair. The backrest and seat are padded with high resilience foam and covered with twill fabric upholstery for a soft, skin-friendly, long sitting experience. In addition, the chair uses an SGS certified Class 3 gas lift that can hold up to 350 lbs. The wider cushion and high quality gas pole provide you with long-lasting comfort.

✨【Ergonomic & Comfortable】The U-shaped design gradually releases the pressure on the back and hips from the middle to the sides, providing strong support for the back. The backrest and cushion are designed to fit the curve of the human spine, helping to adjust your sitting posture, reduce fatigue and injury caused by prolonged sitting and improve your work efficiency.

✨【Multi-Function】PUKAMI office chair with 5'' adjustable height, 360 degree swivel angle and 108°-130° tilt angle, whether for office or leisure, it provides you with the most comfortable height and angle. You can use the powerful lever to adjust the seat height or keep the backrest upright, and turn the knob under the seat to control the tilt tension.

✨【Easy To Assemble】The vanity chair comes with all the hardware and necessary tools, as well as detailed instructions. Assembling this office chair yourself in the office or at home is easy and takes only 15 minutes.This would be a great choice for a gift for your girlfriend,wife and daughters!
✨【Excellent Customer Service】If there is any problem with the office chair, please contact us directly.Our customer support team will respond within 24 hours! 100% satisfactory solution if any issue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the office, and it is perfect. The chair is very stable, and extremely comfortable. The extra wide seat allows for you to sit criss-cross in the seat comfortablyThis was exactly what I was hoping for, and it looks great as well. Also this chair is very easy to put together, and not extremely heavy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair. Such nice quality, super comfy. If you prefer sitting cris cross, this is your chair! Adjusts up and down, easy to put together. Color is nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great WIDE chair
reviews.reviewText: Assembly: 5/5 I was able to assemble by myself with just a little maneuvering, adding the back of the chair took 2 tried since the first the screws were not alighted right and THIS created a creaking sound when I sat. After adjusting and taking more care the sound is gone and screws are flush in place.Feel of chair: 4/5 the height is higher than expected which is great for my desk. It is really wide but I would say if you are over 5’7 and plus size you might not be able to fully cross cross your legs but you can wrap one leg under you (my preferred seating). People note the back rest is low, I find it to still be very comfortable and provide support. But yes it hits mid back not full back.Functions: 4/5 it rises falls and swivels great! However, I am not sure if my tension is broken but it does not work and there is barely a tilt in the chair. After many tries and some stronger friends help the tension cannot be adjusted. This losses a star because I would have preferred a fully functional chair. And it’s nice to be able to lean back.A note: this chair has no creaking noises as others have noted. Perhaps it’s because my tilt function is not working that I do not have the creaking noise but I find it a very smooth and quiet chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this chair - it went viral for a reason! Very easy to put together which I appreciate. All of my friends are jealous and love sitting in it when they are over. It's very comfortable to sit in for work and for leisure. Some have complained about the lack of wheels but personally I like that about it - I don't like to be sliding around when I'm working. I have the chair on a cute rug and it looks beautiful in my home. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m obsessed with this desk chair! It allows me to have better posture throughout the work day and be comfortable. It took a few minutes to assemble and that was with just myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this chair!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair for my Vanity and I absolutely love it! It is big enough to sit with you legs up cris-crossed and so cushy! I’ve sat in it for hours for classes and it’s amazing, 100% worth it. And it’s super easy to put together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: I was initially worried about putting this chair together but it was super easy and looks great! I am a big person and I can still sit with my legs up and be super comfy. Worth the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the chair!
reviews.reviewText: Are you looking for the perfect version of that viral tiktok “criss-cross applesauce” chair? Here it is. It’s comfortable, sturdy, has a high weight limit to accommodate more than just the dainty ladies, and it looks great at my makeup vanity. I’m super pleased!

This chair is everything. If you're anything like me and need to put your legs up while you're sitting, this is your chair! I can sit cross legged no problem on this chair and it's super comfy. I wish the back was a tad bit higher but it works. Super easy to assemble and not that heavy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do not recommend buying. Seat is not secured to the base
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable.I dislike that the seat and base are not secured to each other. If you lift the chair to move it, the seat comes apart from the pole and the base.However the seat itself is great, it has improved my productivity at my desk!EDIT: I have had the chair for over a month and do not recommend this model.It has a creaking and sudden shifts in the tension that is extremely unsettling for a gas powered chair. Explosion do occur allbeit rarely.I will be throwing away this chair and buying a replacement one from an in person store not online.UPDATE: October 10 2023The seller reached out to resolve my experience, even though it had been months since I ordered the product. I will say the customer service is quality.

The media could not be loaded. My chair seems to be defective in a couple of ways. The metal base is not level. It’s like an old restaurant chair and needs some napkins under the feet. It’s significant enough that you feel a lean.The lid to the gas canister as well was broken so I’m afraid the canister itself won’t be good for long either since the instructions said to remove the lid carefully and mine was broken almost in half and fell off by itself. (EDIT the canister is leaking fluid and bangs when you sit or stand. I’ll have to pack it up and return it and that makes me sad. I really do like all the good parts)I really want this chair so hopefully I can contact the seller for a new base. Sitting cross legged makes me so happy and the fabric and quality of the chair seems awesome otherwise!UPDATE: the chair was not perfect but the customer service was! Would not hesitate to buy from them again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfy and large, but seat has screw/piece of metal sticking up through cushion (dangerous)
reviews.reviewText: The chair is great - its comfy, and easy to sit cross-legged and it looks good.I took off 2 stars because on the right side of the seat cushion, you can feel something sharp sticking up through the cushion. its not visible when just sitting there, but if any weight is put on it, it can pierce through the cushion into your body. it feels like an error in the assembly of the cushion because there is no screw anywhere in that area.
